ai-thag1.120:1.1_0: The five aggregates are fully understood,
ai-thag1.120:1.3_0: I have reached the ending of suffering,
ai-thag1.120:1.4_0: that I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thag1.120:1.7_0: the twelfth of the sky is clear.
ai-thag1.120:2.2_0: And to defecate in a forest grove
ai-thag1.120:2.7_0: The Book of the Ones is finished.
ai-thag1.120:3.0_0: The account of the thirty-six streams
ai-thag1.120:3.1_0: The senior mendicants who were elderly
